trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
trans-unit.target: 장치 글꼴의 문자를 배치 하는 데 사용 하는 메트릭을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> object is constructed using the default metric values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>개체는 기본 메트릭 값을 사용 하 여 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class by specifying the metrics as a string.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 메트릭을 문자열로 지정 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `metrics` parameter is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: `metrics` 매개 변수는 지정 하는 쉼표로 구분 된 문자열의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>다음과 같은 순서로 속성:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>처음 두 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, 필요한.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 다른&5; 개의 속성이 선택 사항 및는 기본적으로&0;으로 지정 하지 않으면.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 "0.75,0.75,,0.1"의 문자열 값을 지정 하는 경우 등는 `metrics` 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>속성이 설정 되어-지정 되지 않은 속성이&0;으로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited <xref:System.String> value that represents the metrics for the character.
trans-unit.target: 쉼표로 구분 하 여 <xref:System.String>문자에 대 한 메트릭을 나타내는 값입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the character.
trans-unit.target: 문자에 대 한 초기 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The return value represents the vertical offset from the bottom of the black box to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 반환 값 기준에 블랙 박스 아래쪽에서 세로 오프셋을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates the baseline is above the bottom of the black box, while a negative value indicates the baseline is below the bottom of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 양수 값을 음수 값 이면 검정 상자의 맨 아래는 초기 기준선은 블랙 박스 아래쪽 위에 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 값 <xref:System.Double>기준선을 나타내는.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: 문자에 대 한 블랙 박스의 높이 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box height.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 값 <xref:System.Double>블랙 박스 높이 나타내는.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: 문자에 대 한 블랙 박스의 너비를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box width.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 값 <xref:System.Double>블랙 박스 너비를 나타내는.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space below the black box.
trans-unit.target: 블랙 박스 아래 권장된 공백을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 음수 값은 돌출을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and BottomSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: 문자에 대 한 확장 높이 속성 값의 합계인 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, 및 BottomSideBearing.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 확장 높이&0; 보다 작을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> 형식의 값

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 현재 개체가 같은지 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>개체는 다음 속성이 같은지: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 현재 비교할 개체를 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>개체가 동일 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from the metric values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 메트릭 값의 해시 코드를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32> 형식의 값

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the left of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 블랙 박스 왼쪽 여백 권장된 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 음수 값은 돌출을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 문자 너비는 LeftSideBearing 속성 값의 합계 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 너비는&0; 보다 작을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> 형식의 값

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string representing metric values.
trans-unit.target: 메트릭 값을 나타내는 쉼표로 구분 된 문자열을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>값은 쉼표로 구분 된 문자열을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>다음과 같은 순서로 속성:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>처음 두 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, 필요한.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 다른&5; 개의 속성이 선택 사항 및는 기본적으로&0;으로 지정 하지 않으면.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 문자열 값을 지정 하는 경우 등 "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`"에 대 한는 `metrics` 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>속성이 설정 되어-지정 되지 않은 속성이&0;으로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 형식의 값

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the right of the black box.
trans-unit.target: 블랙 박스 오른쪽 여백 권장된 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: 음수 값은 돌출을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and RightSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: 문자 너비는 속성 값의 합계 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, 및 RightSideBearing.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 너비는&0; 보다 작을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> 형식의 값

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: 블랙 박스 위쪽 여백 권장된를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: 위쪽 여백 권장된 블랙 박스 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 문자에 대 한 확장 높이 TopSideBearing 속성 값의 합계인 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 확장 높이&0; 보다 작을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> 형식의 값
